job.title: Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
The IKE AI Team Engineering Team in our Colorado office at 350 Interlocken Blvd, Broomfield, CO, 80021. Ability to come in-office as needed (3+ times a week).
Anticipated annual compensation will be 85,000 130,000 flexible based on relevant experience. This is a full-time opportunity that offers full benefits including medical, dental, vision, 401(k) with match, and generous paid-time-off and holiday time.
The Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning Engineer will be a key contributor to the engineering project specific to a product, a core of AI/ML functionality and additional features in AI/ML with different methods of persistence and integration. You will research solutions to engineering problems, design solutions with best practices, create the solutions either as an individual contributor and/or by mentoring/peer programming with other software engineers.
The role will be a key member of the AI Team, and will have a strong understanding of the product vision, the current product platform and supporting architecture, along with a strong technical background in relevant technologies.
Since a best-in-class infrastructure platform is critical, this role will have the responsibility of ensuring that ikeGPS' infrastructure platforms perform at best in class with a focus on information security management, system uptime and customer ease of use. This will require working closely with other Team Leads and the System Architect.
Inherent in the role is a desire to be proactive and focus on continuous improvement, resulting in a culture of high performance.
The United States and Canada are in the middle of a communications boom. The drive for more bandwidth is fueling amazing growth in the deployment of fiber and wireless networks. ikeGPS is changing the way communication companies like AT&T, Verizon, and Crown Castle deploy fiber and wireless networks. IKE Analyze from ikeGPS is achieving rapid adoption because we simply help communication companies deploy networks faster and safer while lower deployment costs through better efficiency.
Our integrated field to cloud solutions allow our customers and partners to measure and assess
Utility Poles and infrastructure using a unique combination of Laser, GPS, IMU, and Photogrammetry technologies, all based on a custom-built Android platform and corresponding Cloud service. We combine that with a killer team to create a full solution that delights customers in every way.
We are a collective of pole measurement analysts, scientists, field data collectors, and
customer advocates. We are on this planet to make a profound change in the lives of those
we serve - every human connected through the workflow of pole provisioning projects.
Together, we are building the power and communications infrastructure of the future.
Like many companies, we have our values. Our values are ours and we wear them in our own way. They guide us and they personify us. Our values are not something we leave at the office they are a genuine part of who we are. And well, we think that makes our people exceptional at work and at life.
We are not looking for contract (C2C) hires at this time.
#a
